description.value: Character gains +20 to Willpower Tests made to resist mind control or interrogation. They become mildly socially ignorant, such as not getting jokes. Often provided by a prayer-spewing circuit implanted into the skull.

system.benefit: Character gains +20 to Willpower Tests made to resist mind control or interrogation. They become mildly socially ignorant, such as not getting jokes. Often provided by a prayer-spewing circuit implanted into the skull.

specialAbilities.name: Speak for the Mechanicus
specialAbilities.description: Can speak on behalf of the Adeptus Mechanicus. +10 to social tests with Tech-Priests and Imperial officials.
